turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get that started for you. what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. And what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any cream or sweetener in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Little bit of cream and sweetener.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect and which Starbucks did you want to get it picked up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Las Vegas Starbucks, Rainbow and Oakey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you want a Venti Cafe Americano with a little bit of cream and sweetener.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready at the Starbucks on rainbow and oakey in las vegas in 5 minutes. Enjoy!
